mapper.select: -- retrieveGenTssCmplSmry 개요 조회 SELECT a.TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , a.TSS_SMRY_TXT AS tssSmryTxt --과제개요_연구과제배경 , a.TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT AS tssSmryDvlpTxt --과제개요_주요연구개발내용 , a.RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmTxt --연구개발성과_지재권 , a.RSST_DVLP_OUCM_CTQ_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmCtqTxt --연구개발성과_CTQ , a.RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmEffTxt --연구개발성과_파급효과 , a.QGATE3_DT AS qgate3Dt --Qgate3(품질평가단계) 패스일자 , a.FWD_PLN_TXT AS fwdPlnTxt --사업화출시계획 , a.FNO_PLN_TXT AS fnoPlnTxt --향후 계획 , a.PMIS_CMPL_TXT AS pmisCmplTxt , a.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt --최초등록일시 , a.FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId --최초등록자 , a.LAST_MDFY_DT AS lastMdfyDt --최종수정일시 , a.LAST_MDFY_ID AS lastMdfyId --최종수정자 , isnull(iif(c.tss_st='151' OR c.tss_st='152', a.INIT_FLOW_ATTC_FIL_ID, a.CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID), b.ATTC_FIL_ID ) AS cmplAttcFilId --첨부파일 , isnull(a.NPROD_NM, b.NPROD_NM ) AS nprodNm --신제품명 , case when b.ANCP_OT_PLN_DT is null or b.ANCP_OT_PLN_DT = '' then a.ANCP_OT_PLN_DT else b.ANCP_OT_PLN_DT end as ancpOtPlnDt --예상출시일(계획) , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y , b.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y ) as bizPrftProY , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_1 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_1 ) as bizPrftProY1 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_2 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_2 ) as bizPrftProY2 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_3 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_3 ) as bizPrftProY3 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_4 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_4 ) as bizPrftProY4 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y , b.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y ) as bizPrftProCurY , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_1, b.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_1) as bizPrftProCurY1 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_2, b.BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_2) as bizPrftProCurY2 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y , b.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y ) as bizPrftPlnY , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_1 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_1 ) as bizPrftPlnY1 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_2 , b.BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_2 ) as bizPrftPlnY2 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y , b.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y ) as bizPrftCurY , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_1 , b.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_1 ) as bizPrftCurY1 , isnull(a.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_2 , b.BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_2 ) as bizPrftCurY2 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y , b.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y ) as nprodSalsPlnY , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_1 , b.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_1 ) as nprodSalsPlnY1 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_2 , b.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_2 ) as nprodSalsPlnY2 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_3 , 0 ) as nprodSalsPlnY3 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_4 , 0 ) as nprodSalsPlnY4 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y , b.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y ) as nprodSalsCurY , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_1 , b.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_1 ) as nprodSalsCurY1 , isnull(a.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_2 , b.NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_2 ) as nprodSalsCurY2 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_Y , b.PTC_CPSN_Y ) as ptcCpsnY , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_Y_1 , b.PTC_CPSN_Y_1 ) as ptcCpsnY1 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_Y_2 , b.PTC_CPSN_Y_2 ) as ptcCpsnY2 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_Y_3 , b.PTC_CPSN_Y_3 ) as ptcCpsnY3 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_Y_4 , b.PTC_CPSN_Y_4 ) as ptcCpsnY4 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y , b.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y ) as ptcCpsnCurY , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_1 , b.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_1 ) as ptcCpsnCurY1 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_2 , b.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_2 ) as ptcCpsnCurY2 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_3 , b.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_3 ) as ptcCpsnCurY3 , isnull(a.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_4 , b.PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_4 ) as ptcCpsnCurY4 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_Y , b.EXP_ARSL_Y ) as expArslY , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_Y_1 , b.EXP_ARSL_Y_1 ) as expArslY1 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_Y_2 , b.EXP_ARSL_Y_2 ) as expArslY2 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_Y_3 , b.EXP_ARSL_Y_3 ) as expArslY3 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_Y_4 , b.EXP_ARSL_Y_4 ) as expArslY4 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y , b.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y ) as expArslCurY , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_1 , b.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_1 ) as expArslCurY1 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_2 , b.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_2 ) as expArslCurY2 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_3 , b.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_3 ) as expArslCurY3 , isnull(a.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_4 , b.EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_4 ) as expArslCurY4 FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY A/*일반과제개요*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_GRS_EV_RSLT_RGST B ON B.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD AND B.GRS_EV_ST = 'G2' LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST C ON C.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.insert: -- insertGenTssCmplSmry 개요 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY ( TSS_CD , TSS_SMRY_TXT , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_CTQ_TXT , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT , QGATE3_DT , FWD_PLN_TXT , FNO_PLN_TXT , PMIS_CMPL_TXT , NPROD_NM , ANCP_OT_PLN_DT , BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y , BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_1 , BIZ_PRFT_PRO_Y_2 , BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y , BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_1 , BIZ_PRFT_Pro_CUR_Y_2 , BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y , BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_1 , BIZ_PRFT_PLN_Y_2 , BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y , BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_1 , BIZ_PRFT_CUR_Y_2 , NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y , NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_1 , NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_2 , NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_3 , NPROD_SALS_PLN_Y_4 , NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y , NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_1 , NPROD_SALS_CUR_Y_2 , PTC_CPSN_Y , PTC_CPSN_Y_1 , PTC_CPSN_Y_2 , PTC_CPSN_Y_3 , PTC_CPSN_Y_4 , PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y , PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_1 , PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_2 , PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_3 , PTC_CPSN_CUR_Y_4 , EXP_ARSL_Y , EXP_ARSL_Y_1 , EXP_ARSL_Y_2 , EXP_ARSL_Y_3 , EXP_ARSL_Y_4 , EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y , EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_1 , EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_2 , EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_3 , EXP_ARSL_CUR_Y_4 , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 ) VALUES ( #{tssCd} , #{tssSmryTxt} , #{tssSmryDvlpTxt} , #{rsstDvlpOucmTxt} , #{rsstDvlpOucmCtqTxt} , #{rsstDvlpOucmEffTxt} , #{qgate3Dt} , #{fwdPlnTxt} , #{fnoPlnTxt} , #{pmisCmplTxt} , #{nprodNm} , #{ancpOtPlnDt} , case when #{bizPrftProY} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProY} end , case when #{bizPrftProY1} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProY1} end , case when #{bizPrftProY2} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProY2} end , case when #{bizPrftProCurY} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProCurY} end , case when #{bizPrftProCurY1}= '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProCurY1} end , case when #{bizPrftProCurY2}= '' then '0' else #{bizPrftProCurY2} end , case when #{bizPrftPlnY} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftPlnY} end , case when #{bizPrftPlnY1} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftPlnY1} end , case when #{bizPrftPlnY2} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftPlnY2} end , case when #{bizPrftCurY} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftCurY} end , case when #{bizPrftCurY1} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftCurY1} end , case when #{bizPrftCurY2} = '' then '0' else #{bizPrftCurY2} end , case when #{nprodSalsPlnY} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsPlnY} end , case when #{nprodSalsPlnY1} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsPlnY1} end , case when #{nprodSalsPlnY2} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsPlnY2} end , case when #{nprodSalsPlnY3} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsPlnY3} end , case when #{nprodSalsPlnY4} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsPlnY4} end , case when #{nprodSalsCurY} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsCurY} end , case when #{nprodSalsCurY1} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsCurY1} end , case when #{nprodSalsCurY2} = '' then '0' else #{nprodSalsCurY2} end , case when #{ptcCpsnY} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnY} end , case when #{ptcCpsnY1} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnY1} end , case when #{ptcCpsnY2} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnY2} end , case when #{ptcCpsnY3} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnY3} end , case when #{ptcCpsnY4} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnY4} end , case when #{ptcCpsnCurY} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnCurY} end , case when #{ptcCpsnCurY1} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnCurY1} end , case when #{ptcCpsnCurY2} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnCurY2} end , case when #{ptcCpsnCurY3} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnCurY3} end , case when #{ptcCpsnCurY4} = '' then '0' else #{ptcCpsnCurY4} end , case when #{expArslY} = '' then '0' else #{expArslY} end , case when #{expArslY1} = '' then '0' else #{expArslY1} end , case when #{expArslY2} = '' then '0' else #{expArslY2} end , case when #{expArslY3} = '' then '0' else #{expArslY3} end , case when #{expArslY4} = '' then '0' else #{expArslY4} end , case when #{expArslCurY} = '' then '0' else #{expArslCurY} end , case when #{expArslCurY1} = '' then '0' else #{expArslCurY1} end , case when #{expArslCurY2} = '' then '0' else #{expArslCurY2} end , case when #{expArslCurY3} = '' then '0' else #{expArslCurY3} end , case when #{expArslCurY4} = '' then '0' else #{expArslCurY4} end , #{cmplAttcFilId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} )
mapper.update: -- updateGenTssCmplSmry 개요 수정 UPDATE IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY /*일반과제개요*/ SET TSS_SMRY_TXT = #{tssSmryTxt} --과제개요_연구과제배경 , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT = #{tssSmryDvlpTxt} --과제개요_주요연구개발내용 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmTxt} --연구개발성과_지재권 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_CTQ_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmCtqTxt} --연구개발성과_CTQ , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmEffTxt} --연구개발성과_파급효과 , QGATE3_DT = #{qgate3Dt} --Qgate3(품질평가단계) 패스일자 , FWD_PLN_TXT = #{fwdPlnTxt} --사업화출시계획 , FNO_PLN_TXT = #{fnoPlnTxt} --향후 계획 , PMIS_CMPL_TXT = #{pmisCmplTxt} --지적재산권 risk 검토 , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.select: -- retrieveGenTssCmplInfo 품의서 정보 조회 SELECT TSS_CD , mbrNmList ,isnull((select EXP_ARSL_Y+isnull(EXP_ARSL_Y_1, 0)+isnull(EXP_ARSL_Y_2, 0)+isnull(EXP_ARSL_Y_3,0)+isnull(EXP_ARSL_Y_4, 0) as plnSum from IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY where tss_cd = #{pgTssCd} ), 0) as plnExp , isnull((select sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),KO_RSLT)/1000000)) as arslExcp from IRIS_SAP_BUDG_S_COST where erp_cd = #{wbsCd} ) , 0) as arslExp , CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) AS createDate FROM (SELECT TSS_CD , STUFF((SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + dbo.fn_getSabunName(SA_SABUN_NEW) FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR as T1 WHERE T1.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS mbrNmList FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR T2 WHERE T2.TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} GROUP BY TSS_CD ) A

-- retrieveGenTssCmplPgsCheck 진척율 조회 select round(arsl_cd, 0) as arslCd from IRIS_TSS_GEN_WBS where tss_cd in (select tss_cd from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST where wbs_cd =#{wbsCd} and pgs_step_cd ='PG') and wbs_sn = 1

-- retrieveGenTssCmplGoalCheck 목표기술성과 조회 select case when a.arslCnt > 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as chkYn from ( SELECT count(*) as arslCnt FROM IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL /*과제목표_실적*/ WHERE TSS_CD in (select tss_cd from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST where wbs_cd =#{wbsCd} and pgs_step_cd ='PG') and (convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) = '' or convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) is null) ) a

-- retrieveGenTssCmplItmCheck 필수산출물 등록 체크 SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END checkItm FROM IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM WHERE TSS_CD in (select tss_cd from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST where wbs_cd =#{wbsCd} and pgs_step_cd ='PG') AND YLD_ITM_TYPE IN ('01','03','06','10') -- 제안/GRS, 완료/중단, Qgate01 AND ISNULL(ATTC_FIL_ID,'')='' AND ISNULL(QGATE_LINK_URL,'')=''
